idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Dom Dolla Inspiried Drum loop

# Drums used
kick = 0
snare = 2
hihat = 4

# Beginning
moveTo (0)

# Insert 2 bar fast durm pattern
# Each beat = 0.5 seconds to make it more faster and upbeat

# Bar 1 
playNote (kick, beats=0.5)           
playNote (hihat,beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (snare, beats=0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats = 0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (kick, beats=0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (snare, beats=0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)

# Bar 2 (variation)
playNote (kick, beats=0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (snare, beats=0.5)
playNote (kick, beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (kick, beats=0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (snare, beats=0.25)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote (snare, beats =0.5)
playNote (hihat, beats=0.25)
